title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 20 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 20 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: The LORD hear thee in the day of trouble; the name of the God of Jacob defend thee;
lineList.cn: 愿耶和华在你遭难的日子应允你。愿名为雅各神的高举你。

lineList.en: Send thee help from the sanctuary, and strengthen thee out of Zion;
lineList.cn: 愿他从圣所救助你，从锡安坚固你。

lineList.en: Remember all thy offerings, and accept thy burnt sacrifice; Selah.
lineList.cn: 记念你的一切供献，悦纳你的燔祭。（细拉）

lineList.en: Grant thee according to thine own heart, and fulfil all thy counsel.
lineList.cn: 将你心所愿的赐给你，成就你的一切筹算。

lineList.en: We will rejoice in thy salvation, and in the name of our God we will set up our banners: the LORD fulfil all thy petitions.
lineList.cn: 我们要因你的救恩夸胜，要奉我们神的名竖立旌旗。愿耶和华成就你一切所求的。

lineList.en: Now know I that the LORD saveth his anointed; he will hear him from his holy heaven with the saving strength of his right hand.
lineList.cn: 现在我知道耶和华救护他的受膏者，必从他的圣天上应允他，用右手的能力救护他。

lineList.en: Some trust in chariots, and some in horses: but we will remember the name of the LORD our God.
lineList.cn: 有人靠车，有人靠马。但我们要题到耶和华我们神的名。

lineList.en: They are brought down and fallen: but we are risen, and stand upright.
lineList.cn: 他们都屈身仆倒，我们却起来，立得正直。

lineList.en: Save, LORD: let the king hear us when we call.
lineList.cn: 求耶和华施行拯救。我们呼求的时候，愿王应允我们。
